entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 6.
